phrases: Opening 1st Frame
Signs
Ending
You cowards.
Just shut up and let me shoulder it all!
You do not need to be educated by words.
You need training.
I have made my decision.
Eren was put under the care of the Recon Corps.
He was to dedicate himself to missions outside the Wall.
The former Recon Corps headquarters.
It is nothing more than a renovated old castle.
While it definitely looks impressive,
it is so far from the Walls and all rivers
that it is completely useless to the Recon Corps.
The story goes back to the ambitious early days when the Corps was formed.
Who would have thought we would end up using it again to serve as your hideout?
Do not get cocky, new blood.
What?
I do not know the deal with this crap about you being a Titan,
but we cannot have Captain Levi babysit
That is what you get for talking while riding your horse.
The first moments leave the most important impression.
That newbie was scared shitless.
I think he was just stunned silent by how lame you are.
Still, it is all going according to plan.
Man, you never used to talk like that.
If, by chance, you are trying to imitate Captain Levi,
you should really stop it.
You two are nothing alike, but still...
Do you want to chain me down, Petra?
You are still ways to go to be fitting for my wife.
If only you would bled to death from biting your tongue.
You keep on boasting about how many Titans you have killed too.
So what?
I have boasted about you guys too.
Those people are the Recon Corps' Special Ops Squad,
commonly known as the Levi Unit.
You are pathetic!
Petra Ral.
Took down 10 Titans.
Assisted with taking down another 46.
Auruo Bossard.
Took down 39.
Assisted with another 9.
They are the elite of the elite.
Erd Gin.
Took down 14.
Assisted with another 32.
Gunther Schultz.
Took down 7.
Assisted with another 40.
They are the top tier of the Recon Corps, hand-picked by Captain Levi.
If I went berserk, these people would be the ones to kill me.
It is covered in weeds.
It looks terrible.
It is been disused for a very long time.
Inside, a sea of dust is probably awaiting us.
That is indeed a severe problem.
We must sort it out immediately.
We are done cleaning the upper floors.
Where will I get to sleep in the building, sir?
Your room is in the basement.
The basement again, sir?
Of course.
You are not in complete control of yourself yet.
If you drifted off and turned into a Titan,
at least if you are underground we can restrain you right away.
That was one of the conditions agreed upon for us to get custody of you.
It is a rule that we must follow.
I will take a look around the rooms.
You do this room, Eren.
Yes, sir.
You have got quite a despairing look on your face, Eren.
I do?
Ah, I will be calling you Eren.
Captain Levi does the same.
Here, his word is the law.
Right...
I do not mind that,
but did I really have a despairing look on my face?
It is not surprising at all.
He does not come across as the perfect, invulnerable hero people think he is, does he?
The true Levi is surprisingly short,
irritable, violent, and hard to approach.
That is not it.
I was surprised how obediently he accepts the decisions of the higher-ups.
Did you think that, as strong as he is, he would not care about rank or the chain of command?
Yes.
I expected him not to acquiesce to anyone's words.
I do not know the details myself, but I heard he was pretty much like that originally.
Before joining the Recon Corps, he was a famous thug in the capital's underworld.
But then, why?
I do not know exactly what happened.
He was taken in to the Recon Corps under Commander Erwin's hands.
The Commander?
Hey, Eren!
Yes, sir?
It is no good at all.
Redo it all from scratch.
So, in thirty days, we are to go outside the Walls to build a stronghold for the supply chain?
Not to mention we will be taking fresh graduates with us too.
If we even get any new recruits that is.
In my opinion, this is far too hasty.
Eren's current position is a temporary thing.
We must quickly and smoothly prove his usefulness to Central.
Otherwise, sooner or later, the Police will make another move to
Cannot you take that mask off at least for me, Erwin?
You are really good at sniffing out things like this, Mike.
Too bad you have no scent whatsoever.
I will tell you when the time is right.
We will probably be ordered to stand by for a few more days,
but I heard we are supposed to be going on a large-scale extramural expedition.
And we will be taking the new graduates with us as well.
Is this true, Erd?
Is not it awfully soon?
Even considering that they handled this last Titan attack quite well...
I heard those kids' pants required multiple washings to remove the shitstains.
Is this all true, Captain?
I am not involved in making our plans.
It is Erwin.
He is likely considering far more variables that might occur to us.
It is true that we are in an unprecedented situation.
On the one hand, we lost the Maria reconquest route that we established through huge sacrifices,
but on the other hand, we got an unexpected ray of hope.
I still have trouble believing it.
You can turn into a Titan, but what is that mean, Eren?
My memories from that time are quite hazy.
It felt like a selfless, dreaming state.
It can be triggered by hurting myself.
Like, if I bite
Wait, how do I know this?
You guys know all of this too.
We could not get any more out of him than what is written in the reports.
She will not stay put though.
Her meddling could even kill you, Eren.
She?
Who?
Good evening, gentlemen of the Levi Unit!
Have you made yourselves at home in the castle?
You are early.
How could I stay put now?
Major Hanji?
Sorry for the wait, Eren.
I am charged with experimenting on the two Titans we caught alive in the city.
I want you to help me out with tomorrow's experiments.
I came to ask permission for that.
An experiment?
What am I supposed to
What else but that totally awesome thing you do!
Uh...
I cannot give you permission myself.
I do not have authority over myself, you see.
Levi, what are Eren's plans for tomorrow?
Cleaning the garden.
Okay then, it is decided!
I will be counting on you tomorrow, Eren!
Yes, madam.
But what exactly are these experiments on the Titans?
Hm?
Uh...
What exactly are these experiments...
Stop that.
Do not ask her.
Ah, I knew it.
You just had this expression like you wanted to know.
Were you that interested?
Then I have got no choice.
I guess I have got to tell you
what I know about those pretties we caught earlier.
First, we repeated the experiments we would done each of the five prior times we had Titans to play with.
Hello.
First, we attempted communication.
How are you feeling?
What is your name?
Does it hurt anywhere?
Major, you are too close!
Hello.
Is not the weather wonderful today?
Are you hungry?
Whoa!
Whoa-whoa, that was close!
Major, it is too dangerous!
Sadly, communication proved impossible this time as well.
But for me, interacting with the Titans was so enlightening
that it made me entirely forget my everyday fatigue.
A long, long time ago, there was a tribe who ate people.
They were not Titans like you.
They were humans.
They hid out in caves in the mountains,
attacked travelers who happened to tread the roads nearby,
robbed them of their valuables,
killed them,
and ate their flesh.
She is started another one of her naming ceremonies.
What did we end up with last time?
Chicacchironi and Albert.
They kept up their resistance for 25 years.
During that time, over 500 people became their prey.
That might be more than the humans you guys ate.
They also experimented with various ways of preparing their meals.
Turning the buttocks into steaks.
Cutting the thighs up into cubes and cooking a stew with them.
They minced, kneaded, and fried the hard meat.
Out of fat and innards, they even made sausages.
That is right.
They knew the concept of cooking.
That is how they were different from you.
But then those cannibals made a mistake, and they were all caught and executed.
That is the same as you.
You made the mistake of attacking mankind,
and you were caught.
So I will name you after the man who led that clan.
You are Sawney.
You are Bean.
But do not worry.
I will not have you executed.
Nice to meet you, Sawney.
You too, Bean.
Let us try to get along.
Thus I named the 7 meter class Bean, and the 4 meter class Sawney.
Next we tried denying them sunlight.
The Titans are clearly less active during the night.
These experiments tried to prove that they gain some kind of power from the sunlight.
There was a huge variation between individual Titans.
You have worked hard, Sawney.
Good night.
See you tomorrow.
Sawney's activity dropped an hour after we denied them sunlight.
In contrast...
You really like to stay up late, huh, Bean?
It is okay.
I will stay here with you.
Bean stayed lively for three hours.
They always manage to surprise me.
They do not need water or food.
They have vocal organs, yet they do not need to breathe.
All they need to stay alive is sunlight.
To be honest, I am curious what would happen if we denied them sunlight completely,
but they are such valuable experimental subjects, I cannot risk them dying.
We killed the previous captures by accident.
I accidentally hit the nape of the neck when we tried cutting their heads off.
Their names were Chicacchironi and Albert.
They had such beautiful smiles.
I feel bad about what I did to them.
I do not want that to happen again...
I am sorry.
Major Hanji...
And then,
I moved on to the next stage, testing their sense of pain by actually touching them!
Major, you should not be the one screaming...
How could I not scream, doing this?!
Bean is in so much pain!
Do not give up, Bean!
Hang in there!
We had to confirm whether they had any weaknesses besides the nape of the neck.
It was really tough work.
Sawney?
I just pierced your heart.
Does not it hurt?
How does it feel?
Compared to Bean, Sawney was a lot quieter.
He hardly reacted at all.
Hm?
What was that?
Major, fall back!
that was really close!
You are going to end up actually dying!
Sawney is not very good at expressing himself.
He just keeps trying to bite my head off.
Um, Major Hanji...
How can you stay so carefree in front of the Titans?
They are our natural enemies, who drove us to the brink of extinction.
I am sure you have had to face their threat a number of times before yourself too.
That is right.
I have had countless comrades murdered by them right in front of my eyes.
Back when I joined the Recon Corps, I fought them, fueled by hate.
But then one day I realized...
It was when I cut off and kicked the head of a 3-meter class.
It was light.
Unnaturally so.
Their bodies are light.
Normally such huge bodies should not even be able to stand and walk on two legs.
It is the same with every Titan.
Their cut-off body parts were much lighter than they should have been for their size.
I heard that when you turned into a Titan, that body appeared out of thin air.
I considered that maybe the things we see are not the things that are actually there.
I tried fighting the Titans out of hatred for decades.
Now I want to try looking at them from a different point of view than everyone else.
It might prove to be futile.
But still,
I will do it.
Since I entered the Recon Corps, all I get are surprises.
It is not just Major Hanji.
They are all weirdos.
It is like a haven for freaks.
But it is also a group of people who demand change.
That is the Recon Corps.
Major Hanji,
would you be so kind as to tell me more about your experiments?
Really?
Yes.
I think it might prove useful in tomorrow's experiments if I learn as much as I can.
Right...
I did skip over some of the details in my summary earlier.
Let me tell you everything then.
It may end up taking quite a while though.
That is fine.
When we first captured a Titan, I made a hypothesis.
So you have learned nothing new from what I told you, right?
You should have learned all this as a Cadet.
You knew it all, right?
Yes.
There was nothing new.
So let us go over it again, and this time I will add my personal opinions and assumptions!
Um, I think we
First of all, the Tita
Is Major Hanji here?!
The experiment subjects...
Both of the Titans were killed!
Sawney!
Bean!
This cannot be for real!
Someone tell me I am dreaming!
Those experimental subjects were very valuable.
Was it a soldier?
Yes.
The culprits are still unknown.
Both Titans were killed before sunrise.
When a guard spotted them, they escaped using their 3D Maneuver Gear.
So it was a premeditated move by at least two people?
Sawney!
Check it out!
Major Hanji is losing her shit.
What on Earth...
Let us go.
This is the jurisdiction of the Police.
Yes, sir...
What do you see there?
Who do you think is the enemy?
Excuse me?
Sorry, do not mind me.
The investigation into the murder of Sawney and Bean is ongoing.
Mikasa, Armin, and the rest of the 104th Cadets
face their own fears and doubts as they choose which force they will join.
O, my friend!
This is a victory for us!
Our fame starts here!
O, my friend!
Let us celebrate this victory for the next battle!
I died for naught I will not let it end like that for you
until I am the last one standing
The enemy is cruel...
We will kill
The enemy is colossal...
We will jump
In our hands we hold blades of glory
and sing in the name of victory
We bear the wings of freedom on our backs
Swearing iron determination upon our hearts,
we slash apart the circle of idiocy
and soar through the sky
with our wings of freedom
